# Executions Directory

This directory stores individual pipeline execution metrics files.

## Naming Convention

```
pipeline_YYYY-MM-DD_task-slug.json
```

## Example

```
pipeline_2025-12-22_whisper-command.json
pipeline_2025-12-22_combat-fix.json
```

## Retention

- Keep all metrics for historical analysis
- Consider archiving files older than 90 days
